message: Does anyone have experience with using another method?
I'm thinking that the easiest way is to just have our DNS A records return several results instead of just the single server
I've used stunnel to make SSL work with a reverse proxy but I think it only support DNS round robin.
Are you worried about the ssl overhead on a single machine?
@ericflo i would ask the github guys to see how they are handling it since *everything* on Github is https now
@asenchi That's a good point, I'll do that.
